name: Scream Jump Go!
description:
Chicken screams... chicken jumps!

Jump from pillar to pillar as you collect coins to unlock characters.
____________________________________________

• Endless gameplay
• 10+ Characters
• Simple arcade game for all ages
____________________________________________

Tap control makes game easy to play.

Gameplay becomes more and more challenging as you progress.

Challenge a friend to see who can get the highest score!
